title: Nike font 2006
content: what is the name of the font shown on Portugal Nike jersey for WC2006
author: rockriro

comments.content:
Dunno, but I quite like the numerals :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120617204543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ms_pt_jerseys_6325.png)

The font is called "England's Heartbreak" :-(

Seriously Nike's designers apparently customized each shirt's design and typography to reflect each team's national identity - searching one of the news aggregators for some keywords around this should result in some articles.

Cheers, Si (still crying in my beer)

Watching the game yesterday, I noticed that the numerals on the players shirts were not exactly like the image above.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120617204543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ronaldo_17_5139.jpg)

Si,  
England’s heartbreaker is called Ricardo. ;)

I need the font name for italy jerseys.  
tks

Italy's jerseys are set in Puma Pace, designed by Dalton Maag, Ltd. in London, exclusively for Puma. I do not believe that it is possible to get the font at all, unless perhaps you work for Puma or Dalton Maag ;-)

Many great players cried during this World Cup. Possibly another record that was beaten...

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120617204543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ms_becks_5950.jpg)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120617204543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ms_terry_4904.jpg)

I worked on all the Nike stuff:

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120617204543im_/http:/typophile.com/files/nike_nameplate_6110.gif)

But it's proprietary to Nike and I can't share the font or the number sets. The number sets were all custom drawn and exist in multiple fonts but they didn't come from any single font.
